00026 //----------------------------------------------------------
00027 GrBounds::GrBounds( const GrBounds& bounds )
00028 : _mem( new char[ kMaxMemSize ] )
00029 , _sphere( 0 )
00030 , _frustum( 0 )
00031 {
00032         if ( bounds._sphere )
00033                 _sphere = new( _mem ) MSphere( *bounds._sphere );
00034         else
00035                 _frustum = new( _mem ) GrFrustum( *bounds._frustum );
00036 }

00045         _sphere = new( _mem ) MSphere( sphere );

00074 bool
00075 GrBounds::Intersects( const GrBounds& bounds )
00076 {
00077         if ( _sphere )
00078         {
00080                 if ( bounds._sphere )
00081                         return _sphere->Intersect( *bounds._sphere );
00082 
00084                 return bounds._frustum->IsSphereInside( *_sphere );
00085         }
00086 
00088         if ( bounds._sphere )
00089                 return _frustum->IsSphereInside( *bounds._sphere );
00090 
00092         return _frustum->IsFrustumInside( *bounds._frustum );
00093 }

00109 GrBounds::Intersects( const GrFrustum& bounds )
00110 {
00112         if ( _sphere )
00113                 return bounds.IsSphereInside( *_sphere );
00114 
00116         return _frustum->IsFrustumInside( bounds );
